types.name: StopPlaceRegister
types.description: Query and search for data

fields.name: stopPlace
fields.description: Search for StopPlaces

args.name: page
args.description: Pagenumber when using pagination - default is 0

args.name: size
args.description: Number of hits per page when using pagination - default is 20

args.name: allVersions
args.description: Fetch all versions for entitites in result. Should not be combined with argument versionValidity

args.name: id
args.description: IDs used to lookup StopPlace(s). When used - all other searchparameters are ignored.

args.name: version
args.description: Find stop place from id and version. Only used together with id argument

args.name: versionValidity
args.description: Find stop place from id and version. Only used together with id argument

args.name: stopPlaceType
args.description: Only return StopPlaces with given StopPlaceType(s).

args.name: countyReference
args.description: Only return StopPlaces located in given counties.

args.name: countryReference
args.description: Only return StopPlaces located in given countries.

args.name: tags
args.description: Only return StopPlaces reffered to by the tag names provided. Values should not start with #

args.name: municipalityReference
args.description: Only return StopPlaces located in given municipalities.

args.name: query
args.description: Searches for StopPlace by name, id, imported-id, merged-id or a single tag prefixed with #

args.name: importedId
args.description: Searches for StopPlace by importedId.

args.name: pointInTime
args.description: Sets the point in time to use in search. Only StopPlaces valid on the given timestamp will be returned. If no value is provided, the search will fall back versionValidity's default value. Cannot be combined with versionValidity Date format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXXX

args.name: key
args.description: Must be used together with parameter 'values', other search-parameters are ignored. Defines key to search for.

args.name: withoutLocationOnly
args.description: Set to true to only return objects that do not have coordinates.

args.name: withoutQuaysOnly
args.description: withoutQuaysOnly

args.name: withDuplicatedQuayImportedIds
args.description: Set to true to only return stop places that have quays with duplicated imported IDs.

args.name: withNearbySimilarDuplicates
args.description: withNearbySimilarDuplicates

args.name: hasParking
args.description: hasParking

args.name: onlyMonomodalStopPlaces
args.description: Set to true to only return mono modal stop places.

args.name: values
args.description: Must be used together with parameter 'key', other search-parameters are ignored. Defines value to search for.

args.name: withTags
args.description: If set to true, only stop places with valid tags are returned. If false, filter does not apply.

args.name: code
args.description: Filter results by data producer code space - i.e. code from original imported ID

fields.name: stopPlaceBBox
fields.description: Find StopPlaces within given BoundingBox.

args.name: page
args.description: Pagenumber when using pagination - default is 0

args.name: size
args.description: Number of hits per page when using pagination - default is 20

args.name: lonMin
args.description: Bottom left longitude (xMin).

args.name: latMin
args.description: Bottom left latitude (yMin).

args.name: lonMax
args.description: Top right longitude (xMax).

args.name: latMax
args.description: Top right longitude (yMax).

args.name: ignoreStopPlaceId
args.description: ID of StopPlace to excluded from result.

args.name: includeExpired
args.description: Set to true if expired StopPlaces should be returned, default is 'false'.

args.name: pointInTime
args.description: Sets the point in time to use in search. Only StopPlaces valid on the given timestamp will be returned. If no value is provided, the search will fall back versionValidity's default value. Cannot be combined with versionValidity Date format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXXX

fields.name: topographicPlace
fields.description: Find topographic places

args.name: allVersions
args.description: Fetch all versions for entitites in result. Should not be combined with argument versionValidity

args.name: topographicPlaceType
args.description: Limits results to specified placeType.

args.name: query
args.description: Searches for TopographicPlaces by name.

fields.name: pathLink
fields.description: Find path links

args.name: allVersions
args.description: Fetch all versions for entitites in result. Should not be combined with argument versionValidity

fields.name: parking
fields.description: Find parking

args.description: Pagenumber when using pagination - default is 0

args.name: size
args.description: Number of hits per page when using pagination - default is 20

args.name: allVersions
args.description: Fetch all versions for entitites in result. Should not be combined with argument versionValidity

fields.name: validTransportModes
fields.description: List all valid Transportmode/Submode-combinations.

fields.description: Check if authorized for entity with role

args.name: id
args.description: The entity ID to check authorization for. For instance stop place ID

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Fetches already used tags by name distinctively

args.name: name
args.description: Tag name

fields.name: groupOfStopPlaces
fields.description: Group of stop places

args.name: page
args.description: Pagenumber when using pagination - default is 0

args.name: size
args.description: Number of hits per page when using pagination - default is 20

fields.name: mutateStopPlace
fields.description: Create new or update existing StopPlace

fields.description: Update existing Parent StopPlace

fields.name: mutateGroupOfStopPlaces
fields.description: Mutate group of stop places

fields.name: removeTag
fields.description: Remove tag from referenced entity

args.name: idReference
args.description: A reference to a netex ID. For instance: NSR:StopPlace:1. Types supported: StopPlace

args.name: name
args.description: Tag name

args.name: comment
args.description: A comment for this tag on this entity

fields.name: createTag
fields.description: Create tag for referenced entity.

args.name: idReference
args.description: A reference to a netex ID. For instance: NSR:StopPlace:1. Types supported: StopPlace

args.name: name
args.description: Tag name

args.name: comment
args.description: A comment for this tag on this entity

fields.name: mergeStopPlaces
fields.description: Merges two StopPlaces by terminating 'from'-StopPlace, and copying quays/values into 'to'-StopPlace

args.name: dryRun
args.description: If set to true - the merge is not saved

fields.name: mergeQuays
fields.description: Merges two Quays on a StopPlace.

args.name: dryRun
args.description: If set to true - the merge is not saved

fields.name: moveQuaysToStop
fields.description: Moves one or more quays to a new or existing stop place. Returns the destination stop place.

args.name: quayIds
args.description: A list of Quay IDs to move to the destination stop place. Quays must belong to the same stop place.

args.name: toStopPlaceId
args.description: The target stop place ID to move quays to. If not specified, a new stop place will be created.

fields.name: deleteStopPlace
fields.description: !!! Deletes all versions of StopPlace from database - use with caution !!!

fields.name: terminateStopPlace
fields.description: StopPlace will be terminated and no longer be active after the given date.

fields.name: reopenStopPlace
fields.description: StopPlace will be reopened and immidiately active.

fields.name: deleteQuay
fields.description: Removes quay from StopPlace

fields.name: deleteParking
fields.description: !!! Deletes all versions of Parking from database - use with caution !!!

fields.name: createMultiModalStopPlace
fields.description: Creates a new multimodal parent StopPlace

fields.name: addToMultiModalStopPlace
fields.description: Adds a StopPlace to an existing ParentStopPlace

fields.name: removeFromMultiModalStopPlace
fields.description: Removes a StopPlace from an existing ParentStopPlace

fields.name: deleteGroupOfStopPlaces
fields.description: Hard delete group of stop places by ID

fields.name: removed

fields.name: removedBy
fields.description: Removed by username. Only set if tag has been removed

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.
